scripts.watch-js: NODE_ENV=development rollup -w -c rollup.index.js & NODE_ENV=development rollup -w -c rollup.listener.js
scripts.watch: npm run build-static && NODE_ENV=development npm run watch-html & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.start: npm run teardown && npm run watch & npm run sync
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.index.js & NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.listener.js
scripts.build-static: npm run build-audio && npm run build-images
scripts.build: npm run teardown && npm run build-static && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run compress && npm run rev && npm run build-html
scripts.compress-js: uglifyjs -c -m -o build/index.js -- build/index.js & uglifyjs -c -m -o build/listener.js -- build/listener.js
scripts.compress: npm run compress-js && npm run compress-css
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run s3
